original: Dahlenius, John, rektor, Onsala, f, 13/10/96 i Herrljunga, Älvsb. 1. G. 37 m, Ebba Maria Enderlein. — Stud :ex, i Uddevalla, fil, kand, 23 v. Gbgs hög-’sk,, fil, mag, där 26, provår v. Gbgs h, real 36. Stud:res. t, Engl. o. Tyskl, Vik, lär. v. Tidaholms komm. mellan-sk. o. Trollhättans komm, mellansk, 21, vik, ämneslär. v. Onsala h. folk-sk. 27, ord, 31, rektor sed. 27. Led. av kyrkoråd sed. 31, bibl:styr. sed. 34, komm:fullm. ’sed. 38. Hemv :kretsbef, 43-46. Hemv. ftj :plak. i silver.
translated: Dahlenius, John, principal, Onsala, born on the 13th of October 1896 in Herrljunga, Älvsborgs län. 1st marriage in 1937 to Ebba Maria Enderlein. He took his student exam in Uddevalla and received a Bachelor of Arts degree at the age of 23. He later earned a Master's degree in philosophy at the University of Gothenburg in 1926 and spent a trial year at Gothenburg's high school in 1936. He travelled to England and Germany to study abroad and worked as a substitute teacher at Tidaholms and Trollhättan's middle schools. He worked as a substitute subject teacher at Onsala's elementary school in 1927, became a regular teacher in 1931, and was appointed principal that same year. He has been a member of the church council since 1931 and a member of the library committee since 1934. He was a member of the municipal council from 1938. In 1943-1946, he was the chairman of the local home association. He received a silver plaque as a gift from the local community.
